pli-tv-kd22:1.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ dasa vatthūni dīpenti—
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.2: kappati siṅgiloṇakappo, kappati dvaṅgulakappo, kappati gāmantarakappo, kappati āvāsakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati āciṇṇakappo, kappati amathitakappo, kappati jaḷogiṃ pātuṃ, kappati adasakaṃ nisīdanaṃ, kappati jātarūparajatanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vajjīsu cārikaṃ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.4: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū tadahuposathe kaṃsapātiṃ udakena pūretvā majjhe bhikkhusaṃghassa ṭhapetvā āgatāgate vesālike upāsake evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.8: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vesālike upāsake etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.9: “māvuso, adattha saṃghassa kahāpaṇampi aḍḍhampi pādampi māsakarūpampi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.14: Evampi kho vesālikā upāsakā āyasmatā yasena kākaṇḍakaputtena vuccamānā adaṃsuyeva saṃghassa kahāpaṇampi aḍḍhampi pādampi māsakarūpampi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.15: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū tassā rattiyā accayena taṃ hiraññaṃ bhikkhaggena paṭivīsaṃ ṭhapetvā bhājesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.16: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ yasaṃ kākaṇḍakaputtaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:1.1.18: “Natthi me, āvuso, hiraññassa paṭivīso, nāhaṃ hiraññaṃ sādiyāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.2.2: “ayaṃ, āvuso, yaso kākaṇḍakaputto upāsake saddhe pasanne akkosati, paribhāsati, appasādaṃ karoti;
pli-tv-kd22:1.2.3: handassa mayaṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ karomā”ti te tassa paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ akaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd22:1.2.4: Atha kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vesālike vajjiputtake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.2.8: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sammannitvā āyasmato yasassa kākaṇḍakaputtassa anudūtaṃ adaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd22:1.2.9: Atha kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ vesāliṃ pavisitvā vesālike upāsake etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.2.10: “ahaṃ kirāyasmante upāsake saddhe pasanne akkosāmi, paribhāsāmi, appasādaṃ karomi;
pli-tv-kd22:1.2.11: yohaṃ adhammaṃ adhammoti vadāmi, dhammaṃ dhammoti vadāmi, avinayaṃ avinayoti vadāmi, vinayaṃ vinayoti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.1: Ekamidaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.2: Tatra kho, āvuso, bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.3: ‘cattārome, bhikkhave, candimasūriyānaṃ upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.4: Katame cattāro? Abbhaṃ, bhikkhave, candimasūriyānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti, na bhāsanti na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.5: Mahikā, bhikkhave, candimasūriyānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.6: Dhūmarajo, bhikkhave, candimasūriyānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.7: Rāhu, bhikkhave, asurindo candimasūriyānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro candimasūriyānaṃ upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.9: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattārome samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.11: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā suraṃ pivanti, merayaṃ pivanti, surāmerayapānā appaṭiviratā—
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.12: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.13: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanti, methunadhammā appaṭiviratā—
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.14: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.15: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā jātarūparajataṃ sādiyanti, jātarūparajatappaṭiggahaṇā appaṭiviratā—
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.16: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.17: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā micchājīvena jīvitaṃ kappenti;
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.19: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.20: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti, na bhāsanti, na virocanti’.
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.22: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā—
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.43: Evaṃvādī kirāhaṃ āyasmante upāsake saddhe pasanne akkosāmi, paribhāsāmi, appasādaṃ karomi;
pli-tv-kd22:1.3.44: yohaṃ adhammaṃ adhammoti vadāmi, dhammaṃ dhammoti vadāmi, avinayaṃ avinayoti vadāmi, vinayaṃ vinayoti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.1: Ekamidaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.2: Tena kho pana samayena rājantepure rājaparisāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarakathā udapādi—
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.6: Tena kho panāvuso, samayena maṇicūḷako gāmaṇī tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno hoti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.7: Atha kho, āvuso, maṇicūḷako gāmaṇī taṃ parisaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.13: Asakkhi kho, āvuso, maṇicūḷako gāmaṇī taṃ parisaṃ saññāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.14: Atha kho, āvuso, maṇicūḷako gāmaṇī taṃ parisaṃ saññāpetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.15: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho, āvuso, maṇicūḷako gāmaṇī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.16: ‘idha, bhante, rājantepure rājaparisāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarakathā udapādi—
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.20: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ parisaṃ etadavocaṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.26: Asakkhiṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ parisaṃ saññāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.27: Kaccāhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhāmi, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī’ti?
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.28: ‘Taggha tvaṃ, gāmaṇi, evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva me hosi;
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.29: na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhasi, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.30: Na hi, gāmaṇi, kappati samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ jātarūparajataṃ;
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.34: Yassa kho, gāmaṇi, jātarūparajataṃ kappati, pañcapi tassa kāmaguṇā kappanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.35: Yassa pañca kāmaguṇā kappanti ekaṃsenetaṃ, gāmaṇi, dhāreyyāsi—
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.37: Api cāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, evaṃ vadāmi tiṇaṃ tiṇatthikena pariyesitabbaṃ;
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.41: Na tvevāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.42: Evaṃvādī kirāhaṃ āyasmante upāsake saddhe pasanne akkosāmi, paribhāsāmi, appasādaṃ karomi;
pli-tv-kd22:1.4.43: yohaṃ adhammaṃ adhammoti vadāmi, dhammaṃ dhammoti vadāmi, avinayaṃ avinayoti vadāmi, vinayaṃ vinayoti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.5.1: Ekamidaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha jātarūparajataṃ paṭikkhipi, sikkhāpadañca paññapesi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.5.2: Evaṃvādī kirāhaṃ āyasmante upāsake saddhe pasanne akkosāmi, paribhāsāmi, appasādaṃ karomi;
pli-tv-kd22:1.5.3: yohaṃ adhammaṃ adhammoti vadāmi, dhammaṃ dhammoti vadāmi, avinayaṃ avinayoti vadāmi, vinayaṃ vinayoti vadāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.6.1: Evaṃ vutte, vesālikā upāsakā āyasmantaṃ yasaṃ kākaṇḍakaputtaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:1.6.2: “ekova, bhante, ayyo yaso kākaṇḍakaputto samaṇo sakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd22:1.6.4: Vasatu, bhante, ayyo yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vesāliyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.6.5: Mayaṃ ayyassa yasassa kākaṇḍakaputtassa ussukkaṃ karissāma cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānan”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.6.6: Atha kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vesālike upāsake saññāpetvā anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ārāmaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.7.1: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū anudūtaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:1.7.4: Ekova yaso kākaṇḍakaputto samaṇo sakyaputtiyo kato.
pli-tv-kd22:1.7.7: “ayaṃ, āvuso, yaso kākaṇḍakaputto amhehi asammato gihīnaṃ pakāsesi;
pli-tv-kd22:1.7.10: Atha kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kosambiyaṃ paccuṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.7.11: Atha kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto pāveyyakānañca avantidakkhiṇāpathakānañca bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd22:1.7.16: pure adhammavādino balavanto honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti;
pli-tv-kd22:1.7.17: avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī ahogaṅge pabbate paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.2: Atha kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto yena ahogaṅgo pabbato, yenāyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sambhūtaṃ sāṇavāsiṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto āyasmantaṃ sambhūtaṃ sāṇavāsiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.4: “ime, bhante, vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ dasa vatthūni dīpenti—
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.5: kappati siṅgiloṇakappo, kappati dvaṅgulakappo, kappati gāmantarakappo, kappati āvāsakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati āciṇṇakappo, kappati amathitakappo, kappati jaḷogiṃ pātuṃ, kappati adasakaṃ nisīdanaṃ, kappati jātarūparajatanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.6: Handa mayaṃ, bhante, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādiyissāma.
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.9: pure adhammavādino balavanto honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti;
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.10: avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.11: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī āyasmato yasassa kākaṇḍakaputtassa paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.13: sabbe āraññikā, sabbe piṇḍapātikā, sabbe paṃsukūlikā, sabbe tecīvarikā, sabbeva arahanto—
pli-tv-kd22:1.8.16: appekacce āraññikā, appekacce piṇḍapātikā, appekacce paṃsukūlikā, appekacce tecīvarikā, sabbeva arahanto—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.1: Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mantayamānānaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.3: kaṃ nu kho mayaṃ pakkhaṃ labheyyāma, yena mayaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe balavantatarā assāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā revato soreyye paṭivasati—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.5: bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.8: bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.9: Sace mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ revataṃ pakkhaṃ labhissāma, evaṃ mayaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe balavantatarā assāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.15: Na kho metaṃ patirūpaṃ yohaṃ evarūpe adhikaraṇe osakkeyyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.16: Idāni ca pana te bhikkhū āgacchissanti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.17: Sohaṃ tehi ākiṇṇo na phāsu gamissāmi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.19: Atha kho āyasmā revato soreyyā saṅkassaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.20: Atha kho therā bhikkhū soreyyaṃ gantvā pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.24: Atha kho āyasmā revato saṅkassā kaṇṇakujjaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.25: Atha kho therā bhikkhū saṅkassaṃ gantvā pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.29: Atha kho āyasmā revato kaṇṇakujjā udumbaraṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.30: Atha kho therā bhikkhū kaṇṇakujjaṃ gantvā pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.34: Atha kho āyasmā revato udumbarā aggaḷapuraṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.35: Atha kho therā bhikkhū udumbaraṃ gantvā pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.39: Atha kho āyasmā revato aggaḷapurā sahajātiṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.40: Atha kho therā bhikkhū aggaḷapuraṃ gantvā pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:1.9.44: Atha kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ revataṃ sahajātiyaṃ sambhāvesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.1: Atha kho āyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī āyasmantaṃ yasaṃ kākaṇḍakaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.2: “ayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmā revato bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.3: Sace mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ revataṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāma, paṭibalo āyasmā revato ekeneva pañhena sakalampi rattiṃ vītināmetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.4: Idāni ca panāyasmā revato antevāsikaṃ sarabhāṇakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ajjhesissati.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.5: So tvaṃ tassa bhikkhuno sarabhaññapariyosāne āyasmantaṃ revataṃ upasaṅkamitvā imāni dasa vatthūni puccheyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto āyasmato sambhūtassa sāṇavāsissa paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.7: Atha kho āyasmā revato antevāsikaṃ sarabhāṇakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ajjhesi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.8: Atha kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto tassa bhikkhuno sarabhaññapariyosāne yenāyasmā revato tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ revataṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.9: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto āyasmantaṃ revataṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.17: “Kappati, bhante, dvaṅgulāya chāyāya vītivattāya, vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.21: “Kappati, bhante—idāni gāmantaraṃ gamissāmīti—bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.25: “Kappati, bhante, sambahulā āvāsā samānasīmā nānuposathaṃ kātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.34: “Kappati, bhante, idaṃ me upajjhāyena ajjhāciṇṇaṃ, idaṃ me ācariyena ajjhāciṇṇaṃ, taṃ ajjhācaritun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.35: “Āciṇṇakappo kho, āvuso, ekacco kappati, ekacco na kappatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.38: “Kappati, bhante, yaṃ taṃ khīraṃ khīrabhāvaṃ vijahitaṃ, asampattaṃ dadhibhāvaṃ, taṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ pātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.42: “Kappati, bhante, yā sā surā āsutā, asampattā majjabhāvaṃ, sā pātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.48: “Ime, bhante, vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ imāni dasa vatthūni dīpenti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.49: Handa mayaṃ, bhante, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādiyissāma.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.52: pure adhammavādino balavanto honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti;
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.53: avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:1.10.54: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā revato āyasmato yasassa kākaṇḍakaputtassa paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.2: “yaso kira kākaṇḍakaputto idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādiyitukāmo pakkhaṃ pariyesati, labhati ca kira pakkhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.3: Atha kho vesālikānaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.5: Kaṃ nu kho mayaṃ pakkhaṃ labheyyāma, yena mayaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe balavantatarā assāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.6: Atha kho vesālikānaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.7: “ayaṃ kho āyasmā revato bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.8: Sace mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ revataṃ pakkhaṃ labheyyāma, evaṃ mayaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe balavantatarā assāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.9: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū pahūtaṃ sāmaṇakaṃ parikkhāraṃ paṭiyādesuṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.10: pattampi, cīvarampi, nisīdanampi, sūcigharampi, kāyabandhanampi, parissāvanampi, dhammakaraṇampi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.11: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū taṃ sāmaṇakaṃ parikkhāraṃ ādāya nāvāya sahajātiṃ ujjaviṃsu;
pli-tv-kd22:2.1.12: nāvāya paccorohitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle bhattavissaggaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.1: Atha kho āyasmato sāḷhassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.4: Atha kho āyasmato sāḷhassa, dhammañca vinayañca cetasā paccavekkhantassa, etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.6: Atha kho aññatarā suddhāvāsakāyikā devatā āyasmato sāḷhassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.7: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—suddhāvāsesu devesu antarahitā āyasmato sāḷhassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.8: Atha kho sā devatā āyasmantaṃ sāḷhaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.9: “sādhu, bhante sāḷha, adhammavādī pācīnakā bhikkhū, dhammavādī pāveyyakā bhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.10: Tena hi, bhante sāḷha, yathādhammo tathā tiṭṭhāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.11: “Pubbepi cāhaṃ, devate, etarahi ca yathādhammo tathā ṭhito;
pli-tv-kd22:2.2.12: api cāhaṃ na tāva diṭṭhiṃ āvi karomi, appeva nāma maṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe sammanneyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.1: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū taṃ sāmaṇakaṃ parikkhāraṃ ādāya yenāyasmā revato tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ revataṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.3: pattampi, cīvarampi, nisīdanampi, sūcigharampi, kāyabandhanampi, parissāvanampi, dhammakaraṇampī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.4: “Alaṃ, āvuso, paripuṇṇaṃ me pattacīvaran”ti na icchi paṭiggahetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.5: Tena kho pana samayena uttaro nāma bhikkhu vīsativasso āyasmato revatassa upaṭṭhāko hoti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.6: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū yenāyasmā uttaro tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ uttaraṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.8: pattampi, cīvarampi, nisīdanampi, sūcigharampi, kāyabandhanampi, parissāvanampi, dhammakaraṇampī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.9: “Alaṃ, āvuso, paripuṇṇaṃ me pattacīvaran”ti na icchi paṭiggahetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.10: “Manussā kho, āvuso uttara, bhagavato sāmaṇakaṃ parikkhāraṃ upanāmenti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.11: Sace bhagavā paṭiggaṇhāti, teneva te attamanā honti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.12: No ce bhagavā paṭiggaṇhāti, āyasmato ānandassa upanāmenti—
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.14: Yathā bhagavatā paṭiggahito, evameva so bhavissatīti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.16: Yathā therena paṭiggahito, evameva so bhavissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.17: Atha kho āyasmā uttaro vesālikehi vajjiputtehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno ekaṃ cīvaraṃ aggahesi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.22: Dhammavādī pācīnakā bhikkhū, adhammavādī pāveyyakā bhikkhū’”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.24: kho āyasmā uttaro vesālikānaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā revato tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ revataṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.27: Dhammavādī pācīnakā bhikkhū, adhammavādī pāveyyakā bhikkhū’”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.28: “Adhamme maṃ tvaṃ, bhikkhu, niyojesī”ti thero āyasmantaṃ uttaraṃ paṇāmesi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.29: Atha kho vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ uttaraṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:2.3.32: ‘Adhamme maṃ tvaṃ, bhikkhu, niyojesī’ti thero maṃ paṇāmesī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.1: Atha kho saṃgho taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitukāmo sannipati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.2: Atha kho āyasmā revato saṃghaṃ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.4: Sace mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ idha vūpasamessāma, siyāpi mūlādāyakā bhikkhū punakammāya ukkoṭeyyuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, yatthevimaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuppannaṃ, saṃgho tatthevimaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.6: Atha kho therā bhikkhū vesāliṃ agamaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.8: Tena kho pana samayena sabbakāmī nāma pathabyā saṃghatthero vīsavassasatiko upasampadāya, āyasmato ānandassa saddhivihāriko, vesāliyaṃ paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.9: Atha kho āyasmā revato āyasmantaṃ sambhūtaṃ sāṇavāsiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.10: “ahaṃ, āvuso, yasmiṃ vihāre sabbakāmī thero viharati, taṃ vihāraṃ upagacchāmi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.11: So tvaṃ kālasseva āyasmantaṃ sabbakāmiṃ upasaṅkamitvā imāni dasa vatthūni puccheyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.12: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī āyasmato revatassa paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.13: Atha kho āyasmā revato, yasmiṃ vihāre sabbakāmī thero viharati, taṃ vihāraṃ upagacchi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.4.14: Gabbhe āyasmato sabbakāmissa senāsanaṃ paññattaṃ hoti, gabbhappamukhe āyasmato revatassa.
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.1: Atha kho āyasmā sabbakāmī rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya āyasmantaṃ revataṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.2: “katamena tvaṃ bhūmi vihārena etarahi bahulaṃ viharasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.3: “Mettāvihārena kho ahaṃ, bhante, etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.4: “Kullakavihārena kira tvaṃ bhūmi etarahi bahulaṃ viharasi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.7: Tenāhaṃ etarahipi mettāvihārena bahulaṃ viharāmi, api ca mayā cirappattaṃ arahattanti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.8: Thero pana, bhante, katamena vihārena etarahi bahulaṃ viharatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.9: “Suññatāvihārena kho ahaṃ bhūmi etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.10: “Mahāpurisavihārena kira, bhante, thero etarahi bahulaṃ viharati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.5.13: Tenāhaṃ etarahipi suññatāvihārena bahulaṃ viharāmi, api ca mayā cirappattaṃ arahattan”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.1: Ayañcarahi therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarākathā vippakatā, athāyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī tasmiṃ anuppatto hoti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.2: Atha kho āyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī yenāyasmā sabbakāmī tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sabbakāmiṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sambhūto sāṇavāsī āyasmantaṃ sabbakāmiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.4: “ime, bhante, vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ dasa vatthūni dīpenti—
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.5: kappati siṅgiloṇakappo, kappati dvaṅgulakappo, kappati gāmantarakappo, kappati āvāsakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati āciṇṇakappo, kappati amathitakappo, kappati jaḷogiṃ, pātuṃ kappati adasakaṃ nisīdanaṃ, kappati jātarūparajatanti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.6: Therena, bhante, upajjhāyassa mūle bahudhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto.
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.7: Therassa, bhante, dhammañca vinayañca paccavekkhantassa kathaṃ hoti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.10: “Tayāpi kho, āvuso, upajjhāyassa mūle bahu dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto.
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.11: Tuyhaṃ pana, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca paccavekkhantassa kathaṃ hoti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.14: “Mayhaṃ kho, bhante, dhammañca vinayañca paccavekkhantassa evaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.15: adhammavādī pācīnakā bhikkhū, dhammavādī pāveyyakā bhikkhūti;
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.16: api cāhaṃ na tāva diṭṭhiṃ āvi karomi, appeva nāma maṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe sammanneyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.17: “Mayhampi kho, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca paccavekkhantassa evaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.18: adhammavādī pācīnakā bhikkhū, dhammavādī pāveyyakā bhikkhūti;
pli-tv-kd22:2.6.19: api cāhaṃ na tāva diṭṭhiṃ āvi karomi, appeva nāma maṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe sammanneyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.1: Atha kho saṃgho taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitukāmo sannipati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.2: Tasmiṃ kho pana adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anaggāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.3: Atha kho āyasmā revato saṃghaṃ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.5: Amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anaggāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.6: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ubbāhikāya vūpasameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.7: Saṃgho cattāro pācīnake bhikkhū, cattāro pāveyyake bhikkhū uccini.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.9: āyasmantañca sabbakāmiṃ, āyasmantañca sāḷhaṃ, āyasmantañca khujjasobhitaṃ, āyasmantañca vāsabhagāmikaṃ;
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.11: āyasmantañca revataṃ, āyasmantañca sambhūtaṃ sāṇavāsiṃ, āyasmantañca yasaṃ kākaṇḍakaputtaṃ, āyasmantañca sumananti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.12: Atha kho āyasmā revato saṃghaṃ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.14: Amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anaggāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.15: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho cattāro pācīnake bhikkhū, cattāro pāveyyake bhikkhū sammanneyya ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.18: Amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anaggāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.19: Saṃgho cattāro pācīnake bhikkhū, cattāro pāveyyake bhikkhū sammannati ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.20: Yassāyasmato khamati catunnaṃ pācīnakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, catunnaṃ pāveyyakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sammuti, ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.22: Sammatā saṃghena cattāro pācīnakā bhikkhū, cattāro pāveyyakā bhikkhū, ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.23: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.24: Tena kho pana samayena ajito nāma bhikkhu dasavasso saṃghassa pātimokkhuddesako hoti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.25: Atha kho saṃgho āyasmantampi ajitaṃ sammannati—
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.28: “kattha nu kho mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.31: Yannūna mayaṃ vālikārāme imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.7.32: Atha kho therā bhikkhū vālikārāmaṃ agamaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.1: Atha kho āyasmā revato saṃghaṃ ñāpesi—
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ sabbakāmiṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.6: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ revatena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.7: Atha kho āyasmā revato āyasmantaṃ sabbakāmiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.23: “Kappati, bhante, dvaṅgulāya chāyāya vītivattāya vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.35: “Kappati, bhante—idāni gāmantaraṃ gamissāmīti—bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.47: “Kappati, bhante, sambahulā āvāsā samānasīmā nānuposathaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.73: idaṃ me upajjhāyena ajjhāciṇṇaṃ, idaṃ me ācariyena ajjhāciṇṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.75: “Āciṇṇakappo kho, āvuso, ekacco kappati, ekacco na kappatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.82: “Kappati, bhante, yaṃ taṃ khīraṃ khīrabhāvaṃ vijahitaṃ, asampattaṃ dadhibhāvaṃ, taṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ pātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.94: “Kappati, bhante, yā sā surā āsutā asampattā majjabhāvaṃ, sā pātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.128: Api ca maṃ tvaṃ, āvuso, saṃghamajjhepi imāni dasa vatthūni puccheyyāsi—tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saññattiyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.8.129: Atha kho āyasmā revato āyasmantaṃ sabbakāmiṃ saṃghamajjhepi imāni dasa vatthūni pucchi.
pli-tv-kd22:2.9.1: Imāya kho pana vinayasaṅgītiyā satta bhikkhusatāni anūnāni anadhikāni ahesuṃ, tasmāyaṃ vinayasaṅgīti “sattasatikā”ti vuccatīti.
pli-tv-kd22:2.9.2: Sattasatikakkhandhako dvādasamo. Imamhi khandhake vatthū pañcavīsati.
